---
Song: Vizhiyilae
Film: Bhuvana oru kaelvikkuri
---

---------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d1 n2 S
here, r=r2, g=g2, m=m1, d=d1, n=n2 [unless otherwise specified]
---------------------------------------------------------------------


vizhiyilae malarndhadhu uyirilae  kalandhadhu
s s  r g   s s   r  g   ss r g r  s r  s  n.
C C  D D#  C C   D D#   CC D D# D C D  C  A#.
    
    
 pennenum  ponnazhagae  adadaa    engengum unnazhagae
 n. r r    n. m m  r    n.sn.d.   p.s  s   s s s  s
A#. D D   A#. F F  D   A#.CA#.G#. G.C  C   C C C  C

 adadaa    engengum unnazhagae
 n.sn.d.   p.p. p.  p.p.p. p.
A#.CA#.G#. G.G. G.  G.G.G. G.

un vizhiyae poadhumadi manam mayangum mey marakkum
pudhu ulagin vazhi theriyum ponvilakkae dheepamae

(vizhiyilae)


oaviyanum  varaindhadhillaiyae unnaippoal
p p d p    m p   m  g   r  g   s rm  rsn.
G G G# G   F G   F D#   D D#   C DF  DCA#.

   oarazhagaik kandadhillaiyae
 n.r r r  g    m  p d n d  p
A#.D D D D#    F  G G# A# G# G
 
 
 kaaviyaththin naayagi    karpanaikku oorvasi
 gp p p   d    nd2Sndpm   rm m m   p  dpnd p
D#G G G  G#   A#AC+A#G#GF DF F F   G  G#GA#G# G

kangalukku vilaindha maangani kaadhalukku  malarndha  poongodi
pn p m  g3 m m   g3  m   g3m  rm pm r  s   n.n.  n.   d.  d.p.
GA# G F E  F F   E   F   EF   DF GF D  C  A#.A#. A#. G#. G#.G.

(vizhiyilae)

kaiyyalavu pazhuththa maadhulai paalil
neyyalavu parandha punnagai
munnazhagil kaamini pinnazhagil moagini
moagavalai soodum naeramae yoagam varap paadum raagamae

(vizhiyilae)
